name: Alpha Vantage
headline: Developer-friendly and enterprise-grade APIs for financial marketâ¦
description: Alpha Vantage provides enterprise-grade financial market data through a set of powerful and developer-friendly data APIs and spreadsheets. Whether you need traditional asset classes (e.g., stocks, ETFs, commodities), economic metrics, foreign exchange rates, cryptocurrencies, fundamental data or even technical indicators, Alpha Vantage is your one-stop shop for global market data delivered through REST APIs.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:developer-tools; industry:saas; industry:analytics; industry:api; location:boston

founders.name: Olivier Porte, Founder
founders.description:
I was born in London, UK and raised in Tokyo, Japan and the Bay Area. 
I co-founded Alpha Vantage in 2017, an API/dev tools company that was fortunate to be in the Summer 2018 batch. Today I continue to run Alpha Vantage day-to-day while also doing angel investing (mostly YC startups) on the side.

Stock Market Data API _for_
Algorithmic Trading
Realtime & historical stock market data APIs Options, forex, crypto & other asset classes 60+ technical & economic indicators Market news API & sentiments Global coverage 
[Stock Market API](https://www.alphavantage.co/<https:/www.alphavantage.co/documentation/>) [Global News API](https://www.alphavantage.co/<https:/www.alphavantage.co/documentation/#intelligence>) [Get Free API Key](https://www.alphavantage.co/<https:/www.alphavantage.co/support/#api-key>)
#### We are proud to partner with the following global organizations among others: 
![List of selected partners of Alpha Vantage stock data API, crypto, and forex data feeds](https://www.alphavantage.co/static/img/selectedpartners.jpg)
![NASDAQ celebrates Alpha Vantage as an exchange-licensed provider of US market data @ NASDAQ Tower, Time Square, New York City](https://www.alphavantage.co/static/img/nasdaq_banner.jpg)
NASDAQ celebrates Alpha Vantage as its officially licensed US market data provider@ The NASDAQ Stock Exchange Tower, Time Square, New York City
![stock market data header icon](https://www.alphavantage.co/static/img/financeIcon.png)
### Stock Market Data APIs
Alpha Vantage provides realtime and historical financial market data through a set of powerful and developer-friendly data APIs and spreadsheets. From traditional asset classes (e.g., stocks, ETFs, mutual funds) to economic indicators, from foreign exchange rates to commodities, from fundamental data to technical indicators, Alpha Vantage is your one-stop-shop for enterprise-grade global market data delivered through cloud-based APIs, Excel, and Google Sheets. 
[API Documentation + Demos](https://www.alphavantage.co/<https:/www.alphavantage.co/documentation/>) [Excel + Google Sheet Guide](https://www.alphavantage.co/<https:/www.alphavantage.co/spreadsheets/>)
![stock market data header icon](https://www.alphavantage.co/static/img/academyIcon.png)
### The Alpha Academy™
Whether you are an investor, quantitative researcher, software developer, student, or educator, the Alpha Academy is your open knowledge base for essential content in quantitative investing, machine learning, software development, blockchain technologies and more, all delivered to you by industry experts. 
[Enter the Alpha Academy](https://www.alphavantage.co/<https:/www.alphavantage.co/academy/>)
### About Alpha Vantage
Backed by the prestigious Y Combinator and composed of a tight-knit community of AI researchers, software developers, and financial market experts, Alpha Vantage Inc. has partnered with major exchanges and financial institutions around the world to become a leading provider of global stock APIs as well as foreign exchange rates (forex) and cryptocurrency data feeds. Our cloud-native APIs are centered around rigorous research, cutting edge AI/ML technology, and an unwavering focus on democratizing access to premium-quality financial data.
To get started, browse through the [API documentation](https://www.alphavantage.co/<https:/www.alphavantage.co/documentation/>) for our diverse set of data & API endpoints and [claim your free API key](https://www.alphavantage.co/<https:/www.alphavantage.co/support/#api-key>) to start exploring our full data portfolio!
Please refer to the [support page ](https://www.alphavantage.co/<https:/www.alphavantage.co/support/#support>) or simply email us if you have any questions, feature requests, career, or [partnership](https://www.alphavantage.co/<https:/www.alphavantage.co/media_kit/>) inquiries!
Copyright © Alpha Vantage Inc. 2017-2025 | Site last updated: February 2025 | Boston, Massachusetts | [_Terms of Service_](https://www.alphavantage.co/<https:/www.alphavantage.co/terms_of_service/>) | [_Privacy Policy_](https://www.alphavantage.co/<https:/www.alphavantage.co/privacy/>)
Cookies on this website
The Alpha Vantage website uses cookies to improve your user experience. We have updated our policy to reflect changes in the law on cookies and tracking technologies used on websites. If you continue on this website, you will be providing your consent to our use of cookies. [View more](https://www.alphavantage.co/<https:/www.alphavantage.co/privacy/>)

generated_description:
**Alpha Vantage: Democratizing Financial Data**

Founded in 2017 and based out of Boston, Alpha Vantage is a Y Combinator-backed startup that provides robust, developer-friendly APIs packed with financial market data. What sets them apart is their commitment to serving both individual developers and enterprises, making financial data accessible to everyone. With a tight-knit team of eight, they are focused on harnessing the power of technology to deliver insights that drive better financial decisions.

At its core, Alpha Vantage offers a suite of APIs that allows users to access everything from real-time stock market data to historical prices, foreign exchange rates, commodities, and cryptocurrencies. They also provide valuable economic metrics and technical indicators, all delivered via cloud-based APIs for integration into various applications, Excel spreadsheets, and Google Sheets. Essentially, they’ve created a one-stop shop for anyone who's serious about understanding global markets.

The company’s mission resonates with a broad audience, including algorithmic traders, financial analysts, and anyone interested in financial data analytics. Their tools are especially useful for algorithmic trading, offering a wealth of options along with over 60 technical and economic indicators—a real boon for data-savvy investors.

They’ve partnered with major exchanges, like NASDAQ, enhancing their credibility and reach. Through initiatives like Alpha Academy, they offer educational resources aimed at upskilling users on topics from machine learning to quantitative investing, showcasing their commitment to not just being a data provider but also a knowledge facilitator.

If you're interested in diving into the world of finance with several APIs at your disposal, Alpha Vantage offers an easy start with a free API key, found on their website. It’s clear that they’re not just selling data; they’re building a platform that empowers users through knowledge and real-time information.

For more details, check out their [official site](https://www.alphavantage.co/) or explore the expansive [documentation](https://www.alphavantage.co/documentation/) to get started. Whether you’re a fledgling investor or a seasoned trader, Alpha Vantage holds a wealth of data waiting to be tapped into.
